oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Performance and Interview - Mable John - 2006-07-08 - Tape two of two.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Interview with and performance by Mable John from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on July 8, 2006. Tape two of two. In support of the exhibit I Can’t Stop Loving You: Ray Charles and Country Music.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Mable John;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Continued from tape one. Mable John talks about her recent book -- Introduction of the New Imperials band -- Performance includes: Need Your Love So Bad -- Hallelujah I Love Him So -- I Can't Stop Loving You -- Your Good Thing (Is About To End) -- Closing comments.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: John, Mable; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
